title: Emerald & Ruby Polki Jhumka - Ratna Sangamam
materials: Uncut Polki Diamonds (పోల్కి వజ్రాలు). Features Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: A captivating blend of traditional South Indian design with a contemporary flair. The Jhumka showcases a floral motif at the top, featuring a vibrant oval-cut emerald surrounded by meticulously set Polki diamonds. A large, faceted pear-shaped ruby dangles below, also framed by delicate Polki diamonds. The gold setting is handcrafted with meticulous detail, reflecting the artistry of Hyderabad's skilled artisans.
colors: and sparkling White (తెలుపు) from the Polki diamonds create a regal and auspicious color palette.
occasions: Perfect for traditional South Indian occasions like weddings (వివాహం)
and festivals (పండుగలు). Its timeless elegance also makes it suitable for upscale social gatherings and celebratory events.
description: This Jhumka embodies the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry making, featuring genuine gemstones and exquisite craftsmanship. The combination of Emerald, Ruby, and Polki diamonds is considered auspicious and symbolizes prosperity, good health, and love. The Hyderabadi polish ensures a lasting shine, making it a treasured heirloom for generations. Its unique design balances tradition with modern aesthetics, offering versatility and timeless appeal.
